jdbm.recman
Interface BlockView

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataPage, FileHeader, FreeLogicalRowIdPage, FreePhysicalRowIdPage, PageHeader, TranslationPage
interface BlockView

This is a marker interface that is implemented by classes that interpret blocks of data by pretending to be an overlay.

See Also:
BlockIo.setView(jdbm.recman.BlockView)
